name: coast to coast wrap
notes:
a free version of this pattern can be found on my blog [here.][1]

for more info on the kal for this design launching dec 11, 2025, click [here][2].

designed on a road trip from los angeles to new york city, the coast to coast wrap is inspired both in form and function by the sites along the way. the shape, size, and weight of the wrap makes for the essential travel companion – oversized and cozy, yet lightweight enough so as not to overwhelm. each section of colorwork represents a different part of the country, starting at the pacific ocean, heading east through the mountains, then the vast countryside with nothing but power lines as far as the eye can see, and finally the arrival into the sparkling city that never sleeps. 

shop the full kit [here][3].

one size

width: 28”/71cm
length: 74”/188cm

**skills**

changing colors

mosaic knitting
